main event: A bright oval object was sighted in West Roxbury, Massachusetts, on August 29, 1960, moving in an oval pattern.
interesting points: The object was described as having a light yellow color., The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds., It was observed moving south-west with a blurred shape., The investigator concluded it was likely a meteor., The witness expressed a desire for an ordinary explanation for the sighting.
witness description: a resident who reported the sighting to the Smithsonian.
